summary: Banished and blinded by the Vigilant of Stendarr for practicing dark magic, he spent years hiding and preparing for his revenge.
descriptionHtml:
Background:
Unw was a young Khajiit. He had a taste for blood that couldn't be fed enough, so he joined the Vigilant of Stendarr to have a reason to kill, and to be worshiped for it. Alas, it was not enough. In the nights, he would sneak out of the Hall of the Vigilant and practice necromancy. On the 20th of First Seed, after practicing for four months, he was caught in the act, by Keeper Carcette. He was banished the next day, but not before being blinded. He managed to survive on travelers and merchants. Now, he is stronger and more suited to being blind, but his need for killing has not yet been filled

Requirements: None

Features: Khajiit Follower

Q&A:
Why won't he follow me? Leave a comment and I'll try to fix it
Why does he use a sword? He knows spells he just chooses not to use them
Where can I find him? Riften
author: Nyait
